sourcesContent:
My Tickets

{{ ticket.event.title }}
  • Date: {{ ticket.event.date | date:'medium' }}
  • Location: {{ ticket.event.location }}
  • Category: {{ ticket.category.name }}
  • Price: ${{ ticket.category.price }}
  • Purchase Date: {{ ticket.purchaseDate | date:'medium' }}
  • Status: {{ ticket.status | titlecase }}
You don't have any tickets yet.
Loading tickets...
{{ error }}
